text: is a Japanese football player. She played for the Japan national team. ==Biography== Uetsuji was born in Suita on November 30, 1987. She played for her local club Speranza FC Takatsuki from 2003 to 2004. In 2006, she joined TEPCO Mareeze. However, the club was disbanded for Fukushima nuclear disaster in 2011. In May, she moved to Albirex Niigata. In 2012, she moved to new club Vegalta Sendai. In 2015, she moved to Nippon TV Beleza.Nippon TV Beleza She played as regular player from 2015. However her opportunity to play decreased in 2018. In 2019, she moved to Chifure AS Elfen Saitama.Chifure AS Elfen Saitama In 2021, she moved to Omiya Ardija Ventus.Omiya Ardija Ventus On April 5, 2012, Uetsuji debuted for the Japan national team against Brazil. She played 4 games for Japan until 2015. ==Statistics== List of match in 2012, 2015 at Japan Football Association Japan national team Year Apps Goals 2012 1 0 2013 0 0 2014 0 0 2015 3 0 Total 4 0 ==References== ==Other websites== * *Japan Football Association Category:1987 births Category:Living people Category:Footballers from Osaka Prefecture Category:Japan women's international footballers Category:Nadeshiko League players Category:Speranza Osaka-Takatsuki players Category:TEPCO Mareeze players Category:Albirex Niigata Ladies players Category:Mynavi Sendai Ladies players Category:Nippon TV Tokyo Verdy Beleza players
title: Yumi Uetsuji
